item.description:
Hey All-

A few months ago, I hosted a night where I taught people a little about gaming - gambling style. I would like to do this again and figured I this would be a good time, as I am also scheduling a trip on May 8th to head to Mohegan, if you want to see it and try it for yourself.

I am not good at craps, so I cant teach that, but am willing to teach blackjack(along with its "match the dealer", "in between", and "spanish 21" variations), pai gow poker, sic bo, texas holdem,

I am going to see if I can borrow a dealer friend for the night. If we rent his services, there will be a small charge for the evening to cover his tips and services. But if he cant, I will charge the usual voluntary $1.

I am inviting Boston Cards and conversation to this meet-up as well.
item.name: NYRGN (Not Your Regular Game Night) - Casino Games! Y Bueno Cinco De Mayo!
